name: Herbed Broccoli and Cauliflower
description: This Herbed Broccoli and Cauliflower recipe is a delightful and healthy addition to your meal plan. Perfect for anyone following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, this dish is not only nutritious but also packed with flavors. A part of our Healthy Recipes collection, it's been 'healthified' to ensure you enjoy a delicious yet health-conscious meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the cauliflower and broccoli under cold water and pat dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cauliflower and broccoli into florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together salt and ground pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the salt and pepper mix over the cauliflower and broccoli florets, ensuring they are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the cauliflower and broccoli until tender, about 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the steamed herbed cauliflower and broccoli warm as a delicious, healthy side dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
